column4: if I have a binary tar file what package can I use to make a package that synaptic can track?
depedning on what the binary tar file does.. that may not be very easyly done. Theres just too much varity in binary archives like that.
for firefox bianries you dont really need to install them.. you can cd to their diretory and run it...
extract to a dir.. make an icon/launcher to run it.. perhaps
